objects.text:
Handcrafted Organic Bars
All-Natural Ingredients
Rich Creamy Lather
Eco-Friendly Formula

product_details.name: Luxury Artisan Soap Collection - Natural & Nourishing Bath Bar Set
product_details.description:
• Handcrafted blend of organic soap bars in soothing neutral tones
• Multi-layered collection featuring varied textures and formulations
• All-natural ingredients suitable for sensitive skin
• Long-lasting bars with rich, creamy lather
• Gentle cleansing without harsh chemicals or synthetic additives
• Perfect for daily use and spa-like bathing experience
• Beautifully stacked design makes an elegant gift
• Eco-friendly and biodegradable formula
• Available in various natural scent combinations
• Made with moisturizing oils to keep skin soft and hydrated

banner_details:
This banner features a minimalistic and elegant design aimed at promoting a premium soap product. At the top, a bold retro-style heading (`heading`) introduces the product, followed by a refined serif subheading (`subheading`) that sets the tone for a luxurious artisan collection. The center-left area includes a neatly aligned product description (`description`) that highlights natural and eco-conscious qualities. A stacked arrangement of soap bars is showcased in a central image (`product_image`), adding visual emphasis. Bottom-left includes the product price (`price`) and an eye-catching call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). Background patterns and subtle border elements enhance the sophisticated aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Ivory (#F6F1E9)
- Warm Taupe (#7D5A50)
- Earthy Beige (#B99B6B)
- Classic Brown (#5E4536)
- Accented Cream (#E8D5C4)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases three stacked soap bars in soft, warm tones that evoke cleanliness and calm. The overall color palette features creamy beige (#F5E3D6), pale ivory (#FFF9F4), rich butterscotch yellow (#F7B83D), and soft light peach (#FDE9DA). These muted pastel colors subtly blend into one another, creating a cohesive, natural aesthetic that reflects purity and gentleness. The interplay of shadows and highlights adds visual depth, enhancing the soap bars' curved and natural shapes. For an advertisement banner, a clean white background (#FFFFFF) with accent tones pulled from the soap bars can maintain the product’s gentle, organic feel.
